# Debian docs install

sudo apt install	debian-faq \
			debian-goodies \
			debian-handbook \
			debian-history \
			debian-installer-launcher \
			debian-installer-10netbootarmhf \
			debian-keyring \
			debian-lan-config \
			debian-policy \
			debian-reference \
			debian-reference-common \
			debian-security-support \
			debian-timeline \
			debianutils \
			harden \
			harden-doc \
			harden-tools
			dwww

sudo a2enmod cgi
